features: Triple Calming Effect: Soothing, moisturizing, and strengthening the skin
Texture: Mild, watery toner to prevent stimulation of the skin
Key Ingredients: CICA-7 Complex soothes, calms and protects irritated, weakened skin while Pinus Pinaster Bark extract helps relieve and restore the skin's defenses against external stressors
How to Use: After cleansing, soak a cotton pad with the toner and gently swipe across the face avoiding the eyes and the mouth.
COSRX: Cosmetics + Rx(Prescription) - The best solutions for various skin problems

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cica Blend for Healthy and Resilience! With 7-Cica ingredients that help calm sensitive skin, this toner aids in soothing, moisturizing and strengthening to leave the skin healthier and more resilient. Naturally Sourced This toner infused with 83.2% of Centella Asiatica elevates your skin condition naturally without irritation. Mild and Light Toner Watery texture to prevent stimulation and rapidly relieve visible redness. Suitable for daily use, even for extremely sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, item as describe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for almost 2 years every night with my tretinoin/retinal serum routine. It keeps my skin barrier healthy and also hydrates my skin. I had over-exfoliated one day and after using this 2-3 times, my skin felt much better. This will always be a staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get it if you have extremely sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered this twice that’s how amazing it’s been as an extremely gentle yet effective toner for my hyper sensitive skin, combo more oily, rosacea, currently barrier broken skin. I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy lightweight toner. Bought a second bottle before my first ran out cause it was on sale on prime day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Calming for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I’m often trying new stuff: toners, serums, creams, treatments. Most of the time it’s a mild disappointment, not bad, but not really worth the effort or money. Rarely, it’s a product that makes it into a regular rotation. Sometimes, it’s a big no, a product causing an outbreak or dermatitis, or just super-sensitive skin. In those latter cases I’m coming back to this toner to get my skin back to normal. Have been for the past 3-4 years.It’s not exactly a miracle. Does not make skin bright and shiny and healthy overnight. It’s not super-moisturizing (so you need to use other things in top). But what it is is healing. And calming. Every single time I get a disaster, a few days to a week of this product gets my face back to its prime. I still then go after other products, toners, serums, as this is not a one-size-fit-all, but this is a must for those disastrous times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Product is good for sensitive skin, non irritating and or leaves the skin feeling dry. And because it’s a toner, I’ve noticed it helps slug off dry dead skin prepping your face for your next skin routine, making your moisturizer soak in better. The only down side was the packaging. The box it came in look tampered with like the last product I got from Cosrx ( the top of the product box was open) - so of course I felt causations about using it. Once I inspected it and made sure to see the seal wasn’t messed with, I felt better about using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Effective
reviews.reviewText: This is a product that has no real scent and when you put in on your skin it feels like water. At first, I wasn't sure it was doing anything. However, the few times I accidentally skipped the toner in my routine I noticed that my skin was more tight and dry. The toner gives some light hydration and is also amazing at soothing my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but not for me
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of this toner. Super simple ingredients which is great for my overly sensitive skin. Unfortunately I think I’m sensitive to centella :(
i gave it a try but it really didn't suit my face. i had acne breakout. Maybe it is not really meant for my skin type.It doesnt smell which is great.
